stories.headline: Statement from Dario Amodei on our discussions with the Department of War
Can you reverse engineer our neural network?
Show HN: Badge that shows how well your codebase fits in an LLM's context window
OpenAI and Amazon announce strategic partnership
stories.summary: OpenAI and Amazon announce a strategic partnership bringing OpenAI’s Frontier platform to AWS, expanding AI infrastructure, custom models, and enterprise AI agents.

stories.headline: Get free Claude max 20x for open-source maintainers
Introducing the Stateful Runtime Environment for Agents in Amazon Bedrock
stories.summary: Stateful Runtime for Agents in Amazon Bedrock brings persistent orchestration, memory, and secure execution to multi-step AI workflows powered by OpenAI.

stories.headline: Joint Statement from OpenAI and Microsoft
stories.summary: Microsoft and OpenAI continue to work closely across research, engineering, and product development, building on years of deep collaboration and shared success.

stories.headline: Scaling AI for everyone
stories.summary: Today we’re announcing $110B in new investment at a $730B pre money valuation. This includes $30B from SoftBank, $30B from NVIDIA, and $50B from Amazon.

stories.headline: Ubicloud (YC W24): Software Engineer – $95-$250K in Turkey, Netherlands, CA
Pacific Northwest National Laboratory and OpenAI partner to accelerate federal permitting
stories.summary: OpenAI and Pacific Northwest National Laboratory introduce DraftNEPABench, a new benchmark evaluating how AI coding agents can accelerate federal permitting—showing potential to reduce NEPA drafting t

stories.headline: OpenAI's $110B funding round (investments from Amazon, Nvidia, SoftBank)
After Zomato, Deepinder Goyal returns with a $54M brain-monitoring bet
stories.summary: Zomato co-founder Deepinder Goyal's new wearable startup Temple has raised $54 million in a friends-and-family round at a post-money valuation of about $190 million.

stories.headline: OpenAI raises $110B in one of the largest private funding rounds in history
stories.summary: The new funding consists of a $50 billion investment from Amazon as well as $30 billion each from Nvidia and SoftBank, against a $730 billion valuation.

stories.headline: Plaid valued at $8B in employee share sale
stories.summary: The new valuation is a 31% increase from $6.1 billion Plaid reached in April.

stories.headline: Anthropic CEO stands firm as Pentagon deadline looms
stories.summary: Anthropic CEO Dario Amodei said Thursday that he "cannot in good conscience accede" to the Pentagon's demands to give the military unrestricted access to its AI systems.

stories.headline: Google paid startup Form Energy $1B for its massive 100-hour battery
stories.summary: The deal paves the way for Form Energy to raise a new funding round before potentially going public next year.
